author: Marcus BARNES
title: Tom Hardy has recorded FIVE bedtime stories for CBeebies after epic Valentine’s Day treat for the mums
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments TOM Hardy sent hearts a flutter on Valentine’s Day when he returned for a second outing on CBeebies, and the good news is that he’s due to appear in THREE more. 
The actor , 39, hosted made his debut as a storyteller on New Year’s Day and came back for more on Valentine’s Day sending fans into a frenzy. PA:Press Association 4 Tom Hardy will host three more episodes of Bedtime Stories on CBeebies 
Just over a month later, it was swoons galore when Hardy read Tom McLaughlin’s The Cloudspotter . 
Hardy was joined by his faithful pooch Woodstock as the pair of them got comfortable on a rooftop. 
The Taboo star was joined by a teddy bear and a toy dog as he gazed up at the sky through some binoculars. Twitter: CBeebies Grown-Ups The actor’s appearance attracted a large audience of admirers to watch the kid’s show Twitter: CBeebies Grown-Ups 4 His lines were given a cheeky interpretation by naughty fans 
As he turned to the camera, he greeted his viewers and said: “Hello. I’m Tom and I’m just doing some cloud spotting. If you look very carefully you can see some shapes in the clouds.” 
He then proceeded to read the book The Cloudspotter, which only lasted a few minutes. 
But some fans probably wouldn’t have cared if he’d been reading the phone book as they took to social media to share their love for the British star. 
One wrote: “I want Tom Hardy to read me a bedtime story every night,” while another added: “Yes I’m watching CBeebies bedtime story. No I don’t have children.” 4 The hunky actor in 2011 movie Warrior 
Another fan gushed: “It’s totally normal that I’ve tucked myself up in bed and put onn #tomhardy #bedtimestories right?! I don’t even have kids!” 
This is the second time Tom has read the Bedtime Story for CBeebies, after he settled on the sofa, with Woodstock once again by his side, and read You Must Bring A Hat. 
It’s now been confirmed, to Digital Spy, that Hardy has recorded a grand total of five bedtime stories for the kid’s TV channel. 
Which means his fan club have three more appearances to look forward to, so mums and other fans alike have lots to look forward to. 
Despite the revelation, there is no further word yet on which books Hardy will be reading or when the next three episodes will be aired. Tom Hardy with another smouldering story telling session on CBeebies
